description: Hudson-fujin is http://anidb.net/ch17793 [Sherlock Hound]`s maid, and also http://anidb.net/ch17794 [Professor Moriarty]`s and http://anidb.net/ch17796 [Dr. Watson]`s love interest. Her full name is Marie Hudson. She became a widow at the age of nineteen when her husband died in a plane crash. She is a popular lady at her home town; she has an interest in planes, and she is very good at driving and shooting. Moriarty and his gang kidnapped her once, and they were completely amazed by her beauty and gracious behaviour.
name: Hudson-fujin
